sentences.cn: 关于他短暂演员生涯的趣闻逸事

sentences.en: David's play was amusing and its pacifist angle had a great appeal.
sentences.cn: 戴维的剧本很有趣,剧中的和平主义倾向性有很大的吸引力.

sentences.en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentences.cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentences.en: He always lays on the colours to make his stories more amusing.
sentences.cn: 他总是用夸张的手法使他的故事更有趣.

sentences.en: He had a terrific sense of humour and could be very amusing.
sentences.cn: 他极具幽默感，很会逗人发笑。

sentences.en: He related some amusing stories in his childhood to his children.
sentences.cn: 他向孩子们述说了他少年时代的一些趣事.

sentences.en: He was witty, amusing and gifted with a sharp business brain.
sentences.cn: 他机智诙谐，具有敏锐的商业头脑。

sentences.en: His intejection of amusing stories into his speech made it more interesting.
sentences.cn: 他发言时插进了一些有趣的故事,使他的发言更加妙趣横生.

sentences.en: I didn't find the joke at all amusing.
sentences.cn: 我认为这笑话一点也不可笑。

sentences.en: I don’t find his jokes at all amusing .
sentences.cn: 我觉得他的笑话一点都不好笑。

sentences.en: John is very amusing when he is completely befuddled.
sentences.cn: 当约翰喝得完全糊涂了的时候,他非常有趣儿.

sentences.en: The dialogue is amusing but the plot is weak.
sentences.cn: 对白逗趣但是情节薄弱。

sentences.en: The otherwise dreary book is enlivened by some very amusing illustrations.
sentences.cn: 这本枯燥乏味的书幸亏加了一些精彩的插图才变得生动有趣.

sentences.en: The play was amusing, but it was little more than froth.
sentences.cn: 这出戏还算有趣, 不过内容有些空泛.

sentences.en: The show is very amusing and the cast are very good.
sentences.cn: 演出妙趣横生，演员的表演也很出彩。

sentences.en: The youngsters got up to all sorts of amusing antics.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人做出各种各样可笑的蠢事.
